Alchemist Zephyra:
So, try to create 1 Wind Stone and 1 Potion of Healing Wind.
To get the Wind Stone, You will need to mix objects with alembic. Put all the materials, click on "Mix" and You will get the desired result. The more You mix the items, the more You will have Stones of the Wind.
Potion of Healing Wind can be created through alchemical transmutation. Click on "Convert" and You will see a list of things that can be done. The necessary materials can be found in the Grocer's Rani. Just keep in mind, You should have all the materials from the list, otherwise it will not work!
